item.title: Indian fighter jet pilot killed in crash at Dubai airshow
item.description: A court inquiry is being carried out to assess the cause of the crash.

item.title: Trump calls Democrat video to troops 'seditious behaviour, punishable by death'
item.description: Trump's comments came after a group of Democrats urged US service members to refuse unlawful commands.

item.title: Pupils abducted from Catholic school in fresh Nigeria attack
item.description: Security forces have launched operations to assess the situation and locate the missing pupils.

item.title: Fukushima owner edges towards restarting first reactor since meltdown
item.description: The Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant has not been in operation since the 2011 disaster.

item.title: South African women stage purple protest over gender violence
item.description: Nearly 1,000 women were raped and 137 murdered in the first three months of this year.
